name: (Kai)

Weapon1.SecondaryD: Grabs an enemy temporarily stunning them and yourself dealing small damage.

Ability1D: Leaps through the air. If you hit a wall during your jump you are given the option to perform an additional wall jump.
Ability2D: Shoots a large banana projectile that explodes on impact dealing big damage and slowly enemies in blast radius.
PassiveD: When an ally is within close vicinity you and ally gain increased movement speed.
UltimateD: Enrages yourself for some time. Monkey jump and Monkey grab cooldowns drastically reduced. Gain a damage increase. Allies in radius of you when ultimate is used gain temporary movement speed increase.
